LOS ANGELES( AP)- Simon Cowell wants his new Fox talent series`` The X Factor'' to include controversy, vocal groups and, maybe, Paula Abdul on the judging panel. We've spoken to her, she knows I'm a big fan, Simon Cowell said of his former fellow`` American Idol'' judge.`` I've always said at some point we are going to be working together.'' But, he added,

this, there would be no point in making the show.'' The mentoring component grew out of him becoming bored and frustrated just sitting at the Idol desk and picking apart performances, Simon Cowell said. I wanted to make a show on which I and my fellow judges could help on a weekly basis. It's interesting to be judged as much as the artists. It really does become incredibly competitive. Unlike the singers, we don't pretend to like each other. Simon Cowell avoided commenting extensively on the new`` Idol'' judges panel, saying he hasn't seen a whole episode.`` From what I've seen and heard, things seem to be going well,

from his appearance on`` The Late Show With David Letterman '' to sold-out stadium shows with Jay-Z. But in terms of hip-hop on the main stage, there's still a ways to go.
